summary: The aging scientist Faust is desperately in search of knowledge and insight, but without success. To escape from this ignorance, he dares the extreme: He joins forces with the devil. ... See full summary »
cast: Will Quadflieg|Gustaf Gründgens|Ella Büchi|Elisabeth Flickenschildt|Hermann Schomberg|Eduard Marks|Max Eckard|Uwe Friedrichsen|Heinz Reincke|Hans Irle|Friedrich G. Beckhaus|Karl Heinz Wüpper|Heidi Leupolt|Gustl Busch|Konrad Krauss|Eugen Klimm|Christian Rode|Karl-Heinz von Hassel|Renate Wegener|Dieter Wossidlo
title: Faust
